titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable, Sir Robert Clayton, Lord-Mayor of the city of London the humble petition of the common-hall assembled.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Clayton, Robert, Sir, 1629-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Petition to remove Sir George Jefferies from position of recorder of the city of London.
